title: [Warrior Guild, SE Corner]
description: The hall turns at aright angle, becoming darker to the north, following the corners of the sturdy limestone fortress.  A sheet of sunlight streaks in through a slit set high in the wall, illuminating the narrow stone staircase that leads up along the wall to the second floor.

The hall turns at a right angle, becoming darker to the north, following the corners of the sturdy limestone fortress.  A sheet of moonlight streaks in through a slit set high in the wall, dimly illuminating the narrow stone staircase that leads up along the wall to the second floor.
